name: Back to Back
text:
You may swap with a friendly minion adjacent to you.
**This turn:** You and friendly heroes in radius gain +1 ::defense:: Defense if adjacent to one or more friendly minions.

name: Point Blank Shot
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: Push the target 1 space, if it is adjacent to you.
_(A unit pushed into an obstacle will stop. This is a valid push)_

name: Bang
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push the target 1 space.

name: Quickdraw
text: Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.

name: Gunslinger
text:
Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.
+2 ::attack:: Attack if the target hero played an attack card this turn.
_(A revealed card is "played" even if it's not resolved yet.)_

name: Dead Shot
text:
Target a unit in range.
+2 ::attack:: Attack if the target hero played an attack card this turn.

name: Shootout
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: If you defeated a minion with this attack, and there is no enemy hero in range, you may remove a non-heavy minion adjacent to you.
_(You gain no coins for removing a minion.)_

name: Bullet Hell
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: If you defeated a minion with this attack, and there is no enemy hero in range, you may remove a non-heavy minion in range.

name: Command
text:
Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to 2 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.
_(You may move a heavy minion with this skill.)_

name: Control
text: Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to 3 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.

name: Tactical Advantage
text:
Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to 3 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.
May repeat once.

name: Lead the Charge
text: If you are adjacent to a friendly minion, block the attack.

name: Plot Armor
text: If you are adjacent to a friendly minion, block the attack and **This turn:** You are immune to all other enemy actions.

name: Basic Drill
text: **This round:** When you, or a friendly hero, perform a basic attack, count all friendly minions in radius, including the immune ones, as ranged.

name: Battle Drill
text: **This round:** When you, or a friendly hero, perform an attack, count all friendly minions in radius, including the immune ones, as ranged.

name: Field Promotion
text:
**This round:** When you, or a friendly hero, perform an attack, count all friendly minions in radius, including the immune ones, as both melee and ranged.
_(This can reduce the defense total by up to 2 per minion.)_

name: Close Support
text: If you are adjacent to a friendly minion, an enemy hero in radius discard a card, if able.

name: Covering Fire
text: If you are adjacent to a friendly minion, an enemy hero in radius discard a card, or is defeated.

name: Big Sodding Gun
text: Your basic attack has +2 ::range:: Range and +2 ::attack:: Attack. If you push an enemy hero, that hero discards a card, or is defeated.
